patterns: Can you introduce birds for me?
Is there any interesting knowledge about bird?
responses: Ravens are great at mimicking human speech and sounds
Some ducks sleep with one eye open
Most hummingbirds weigh less than a nickel
Woodpeckers hoard acorns
An albatross can sleep while it flies. It apparently dozes while cruising at 25 mph
Owls cannot move their eyes
There are about 10,000 known bird species
Birds communicate using sound and color
Birds have a very high metabolic rate
